mapper.select: select lead_id , del_yn , created_by , created , last_upd_by , last_upd , reg_chnl_cd , con_type_cd , spec_desc , pros_id from lead

select lead_id , del_yn , created_by , created , last_upd_by , last_upd , reg_chnl_cd , con_type_cd , spec_desc , pros_id from (select rownum rn , lead_id , del_yn , created_by , created , last_upd_by , last_upd , reg_chnl_cd , con_type_cd , spec_desc , pros_id from lead order by last_upd desc ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} and rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
